My Work Experience

Check out some of my projects...

"I am a 'switcher' and I need help experience"

For more than 13 years I have been engaged in promotion and sales of products. The last 9 years my main task was to develop the supply and sale of goods from Europe. During this period I formed and trained a team of specialists, increased the range of products and achieved the highest results in terms of sales and profits in the company.

I am a responsible and result-oriented team player. In general, I always take an active position and try to get to the heart of the matter to solve the tasks quickly and qualitatively. The desire to develop moves me forward.

So, I'm looking for new opportunities to improve my skills and achieve new goals.

* { There ain't nothing I can't do! }

Best regards,
                    Michael Feninets
